title: "Inspection Types & Stakeholders"

## Common Inspection Types

| Type | Conducted By | Purpose |
|------|-------------|--------|
| Regulatory Inspection | FDA / EMA / MHRA | Regulatory compliance |
| Sponsor Audit | Sponsor QA | Oversight of CRO/site |
| CRO Audit | CRO QA | Internal quality control |
| IRB Audit | IRB | Human subjects protection |

## CRA Role by Stakeholder

| Stakeholder | CRA Role |
|------------|---------|
| Regulatory Authority | Provide documentation, clarify processes |
| Sponsor QA | Support evidence collection |
| CRO QA | Ensure SOP compliance |
| Site | Guide inspection logistics |
